title: PLEASE HELP ME IM STUCK IN RECONNECTING SCREEN
body: I'M STUCK IN RECONNECTING SCREEN I CANT GET OUT. I'M NOT EVEN IN GAME. WHEN I PRESS RECONNECT IT SAYS UNABLE TO CONNECT TO THE SERVER. PLEASE CHECK YOUR NETWORK CONNECT AND ATTEMPT TO RECONNECT TO YOUR GAME. PLZ HELP ME I CANT PLAY!

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is called a ghost game, these occur when your client doesn't receive the proper "End Game" message.

It should resolve itself within a couple of hours at most.
